website.WhatIsEsim.content.paragraph2: eSIMs are available on smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, and even some cars! They're great for quickly switching between phone numbers and grabbing mobile data for travel.
website.NewSimfinDes.download_esim_app.Dowonload: On iPhone
Set up with the Simfinity iPhone App
Open the Simfinity App
Launch the Simfinity eSIM app on your iPhone.
Select Your Destination
Pick the country where you’ll use your data plan.
Install Your eSIM
Scan the QR code or follow the on-screen instructions to install.
Manual iPhone Setup
Go to Settings > Cellular.
Tap Add eSIM and scan the QR code.
Follow the install prompts to complete.
Activate the plan when prompted.
On Android
Set up with the Simfinity Android App
Open the Android App
Launch the Simfinity app on your Android device.
Choose a Data Plan
Select the eSIM plan you want to use.
Install via QR
Manual Android Setup
Go to Settings > Network & Internet.
Tap SIMs > Add eSIM.
Scan the QR code shown in the app.
Complete the installation prompts.
Frequently Asked Questions
Is the Simfinity app free?
Yes, downloading and using the app is completely free.
You can install the app on any compatible device, but eSIM plans are tied to a single device.
Do I need an internet connection?
Yes, you need internet to download and install your eSIM plan.
Is support available?
Do I need a physical SIM?
No, eSIMs are digital and replace the need for a physical SIM card.
To start using an eSIM, just buy an eSIM plan and complete a quick setup. No need to remove your current SIM card — it can stay where it is, whether you decide to keep using it or not.
website.NewSimfinDes.download_esim_app.Dowonload: Scan QR code or follow the setup instructions.
Can I use the app on multiple devices?
Our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email.
Can I preview plans offline?
Are there in-app notifications?
Yes, you’ll receive updates and alerts in the app.
Can I delete my eSIM later?
Yes, you can remove the eSIM profile in your phone settings.

website.home.howItWorks.step1Desc: Select a data package for your destination
website.NewSimfinDes.what_is_esim.WhatIsEsim.Esi: eSIMs are the future of connectivity. Here are the main eSIM benefits.
Travelers can buy eSIMs that connect them to local carriers and avoid unexpected roaming fees.
You can have multiple virtual eSIMs on one device, making it easy to switch between different carriers and phone numbers.
Off to Japan for a week? Get a 7-day plan instead of monthly, and save your yen for an extra okonomiyaki.
The absence of a physical SIM card slot frees up space for other device upgrades (like a bigger battery or more handset features).
Swapping out tiny SIM cards is tricky, especially if you're on the move. An eSIM is built in, so it won't get lost or stolen.
Just like everything else, eSIMs have some drawbacks.
While most modern phones are eSIM compatible, if you're using an older model, you may be out of luck.
If you're new to eSIMs, you might find the activation process a bit more complex than simply inserting a SIM card.
Moving your eSIM to a different device involves more steps than just swapping a physical SIM card.
website.NewSimfinDes.WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.FAQDa: An eSIM is a digital SIM that lets you activate a cellular plan without a physical SIM card.
How do I install an eSIM?
website.WhatIsEsim.content.paragraph1: An eSIM is an embedded subscriber identity module — essentially, a built-in chip in your phone. It does everything a traditional SIM would do, but without having to slot a tiny card into your phone. Additionally, an eSIM allows you to use several carriers and phone numbers at once, which is super convenient.
website.NewSimfinDes.what_is_esim.WhatIsEsim.Esi: What is the difference between an eSIM and a physical SIM?
The main difference between an eSIM and a traditional SIM card is that an eSIM is digital while a SIM card is a physical chip
*Simfinity is all about mobile data right now, so we don't support phone numbers yet. Don't worry — we're working on it.
Manual or automatic (plan activates at your destination)
Manual (need to insert a card into your device)
Affordable — easy to get data plans for different countries
May be expensive due to roaming
website.NewSimfinDes.WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.FAQDa: Can I keep my old SIM?
Yes, many plans are data-only, perfect for travel.
website.WhatIsEsim.content.herodes: An eSIM is a digital SIM built directly into your phone. No physical card. No swapping. No store visits. Just scan, activate, and you’re online instantly. With an eSIM, you can stay connected the moment you land — without paying expensive roaming fees or searching for a local SIM shop. Simfinity eSIMs make travel simple: fast activation, affordable data, and global coverage in minutes.
website.home.hero.subtitle: Get instant mobile data with eSIM. No physical SIM card needed.
An eSIM uses preinstalled software on your device to work just like a physical SIM. Once you activate it, you can connect to a cell network, make calls, and use mobile data. Most modern phones will have built-in eSIMs, but check our list of eSIM-compatible phones to see if yours does.
website.NewSimfinDes.what_is_esim.WhatIsEsim.Esi: A single plastic SIM won't destroy the planet, but getting a newly packaged SIM card for every trip adds up over time. Use an eSIM instead.
website.NewSimfinDes.what_is_esim.WhatIsEsim.get: Find a mobile data plan for your next trip search our list of destinations.
website.NewSimfinDes.WhyChooseSailySection.featu: Get super-affordable eSIM data anywhere in the world. From short trips to long adventures — Simfinity always gives you the lowest travel data cost.
No stores, no swapping cards. Just scan your Simfinity eSIM and boom — you’re connected instantly when you land.
Stop paying crazy roaming charges. Simfinity keeps your bill predictable, clean, and budget-friendly every time you travel.
Keep the same Simfinity eSIM forever. Just add new country plans anytime — no need to reinstall or change SIMs again.
We notify you before your data runs out — so you never get stuck without internet in the middle of your trip.
Whether you're traveling to one country or exploring multiple regions, Simfinity has plans that fit your journey perfectly.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.title: Instant connection, zero travel stress, only with Simfinity
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.des: Traveling should be fun, not frustrating. Simfinity keeps you online instantly, anywhere.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.card1.title: Never ask ‘WiFi password?’ again
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.card1.des: Simfinity keeps you online from the moment you land — no searching for cafés, no begging for hotspots, and no relying on slow public WiFi.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.card2.title: No more SIM card drama
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.card2.des: Skip the hassle of finding SIM shops, swapping tiny cards, or carrying ejector pins. With Simfinity eSIM, everything is digital — activate once, travel freely, and enjoy stress-free connectivity on every trip.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.card3.title: Travel with privacy, powered by Simfinity
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinDes.card3.des: Whether you're booking hotels, using public WiFi, or exploring new cities, your data stays protected with Simfinity. Every eSIM connection is encrypted, secure, and keeps your online activity private — no matter which country you visit. Travel freely knowing your connection is always safe.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinWorkDes.subTitle: Why Simfinity stands out
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinWorkDes.title: A smarter choice for global travelers
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinWorkDes.des: More coverage, better prices, and features that actually make sense.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinWorkDes.card1.des: Simfinity gives you the lowest travel data costs with no hidden fees — perfect for short trips, business travel, and long adventures.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinWorkDes.card2.des: We partner with top networks worldwide to give you stronger, faster data even in remote or challenging locations.
website.NewSimfinDes.NewSimfinWorkDes.card3.des: Built for tourists, backpackers, business flyers, digital nomads, and global movers — Simfinity keeps you connected wherever your journey takes you.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.title: Real travelers. Real experiences. Real Simfinity.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.des: Watch quick reviews from global travelers who use Simfinity on every trip.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review1: Easy, cheap and fast. Easy step-by-step setup, super fast speed, great coverage and helpful support.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review2: I can set it up at home, activate it when I'm ready, and instantly have internet while traveling. Highly recommended.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review3: Simfinity is affordable, easy to use, and provides reliable internet connections worldwide.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review4: There's so much you can't do abroad without proper internet. Simfinity makes it simple and stress-free.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review5: Used Simfinity across multiple countries. Setup took one minute and the internet was excellent.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review6: With great coverage and pricing, Simfinity is one of the best eSIM solutions available.
website.NewSimfinDes.TestimonialsSection.review7: Backed by a trusted brand, Simfinity stands out for its easy installation, affordable plans, and reliable global coverage.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.HeroSec.card.title: Meet the people behind Simfinity
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.HeroSec.card.descr: We've traveled enough to know how frustrating staying connected abroad can be. That's why we built Simfinity — the eSIM app that makes staying connected simple for everyone.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.WhyBuiltSec.title: Why we built Simfinity
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.WhyBuiltSec.para1: People are natural explorers, and crossing the seas has always been the ultimate adventure. For many years, sailing was how they did it. Today, you may not be crossing the ocean to find a new continent, but the urge to travel and explore hasn't gone away. And that's what we're all about
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.WhyBuiltSec.para2: Simfinity gives you the tools to explore the world in a modern way. We're building a future where connectivity is effortless, instant, and entirely digital. No plastic. No borders. Just tap, connect, and go.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.ValuesSection.head: The values that guide us
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.ValuesSection.subh: Our values aren't just inspirational words we put on a wall to look at — we live by them in everything we build.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.ValuesSection.valu: We're replacing plastic SIM cards with an easy and eco-friendly solution that works in 200+ destinations.
No tech jargon. No clutter. We built an eSIM app that's clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate.
We care about people, not just rigid processes. Every team member and user is treated with empathy and respect.
We don't chase perfection — we chase progress. We believe that small wins make big shifts.
We stay curious, flexible, and open to the unknown, just like the explorers we built Simfinity for.
We're here to make a difference, so we focus on what truly matters — our users, team, and the world around us.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.SailyTaleSection.s: We envisioned a better way for travelers to stay online. Today, we're making that vision a reality for thousands around the globe. Here's how Simfinity got here.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.SailyTaleSection.e: The Simfinity eSIM app started with a shared idea — ditch plastic SIM cards and simplify mobile connectivity.
We introduced our first eSIM plans that covered 160+ countries with instant mobile access and zero plastic waste.
We've added built-in security features to our eSIM app so you can browse more safely while you travel.
At the start of the year, we expanded our coverage to 200+ destinations and helped more people than ever stay connected.
At the start of the year, we expanded our coverage to 200+ destinations and helped more people than ever stay connected.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.VoicesSection.head: Voices of the Simfinity crew
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.VoicesSection.subh: Get to know the people behind Simfinity and their vision for easier mobile connection.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.VoicesSection.test: Travelers are at the heart of everything we do at Simfinity. That's why every team is working on making travel connectivity smarter and smoother. We move fast and stay curious to deliver the best possible experience.
Our mission is to make staying connected abroad as simple as possible. We're building a product that travelers can trust, with transparency and reliability at its core.
Innovation drives us forward. We're constantly exploring new ways to improve the travel experience through cutting-edge technology and seamless connectivity solutions.
website.NewSimfinDes.LifeAtSailySection.title: Life at Simfinity
website.NewSimfinDes.LifeAtSailySection.card.0.d: We support your growth with learning opportunities, real responsibilities, and chances to lead (not just follow)
website.NewSimfinDes.LifeAtSailySection.card.1.d: We work together across teams and time zones to build amazing products
website.NewSimfinDes.LifeAtSailySection.card.2.d: We prioritize people and celebrate wins, milestones, and the unique contributions of every team member.
website.NewSimfinDes.LifeAtSailySection.card.3.d: We trust you to lead, experiment, and bring your ideas to life. At Simfinity, everyone has freedom to make bold decisions.
website.NewSimfinDes.LifeAtSailySection.card.4.d: Work from anywhere in the world! We're a borderless team of many nationalities, connected by trust, not time zones.
website.NewSimfinDes.about_us.CareerCTASection.d: Join a team of passionate travelers shaping the future of mobile connectivity.
website.headerlinks.ProductSlider1Description: Reliable global data plans designed for teams, companies, and business travelers.
website.headerlinks.ProductSlider2Description: Reliable global data plans designed for teams, companies, and business travelers.
website.headerlinks.ProductSlider3Description: Estimate how much data you’ll need for your next trip in seconds.
website.NewSimfinDes.SingleCountryPlan.KeyFeatur: Affordable data plans, starting from US$5.99.
High-speed internet for all your travel needs.
Automatic, when you arrive in {{countryName}} (as long as you've turned on your eSIM in the device's settings and enabled roaming).
Instant. If purchased via website, you’ll receive a QR code by email. If via app, it appears in your profile instantly.
Depends on your plan — either 7 or 30 days.
Data-only eSIM. Calls & SMS available via VoIP apps like WhatsApp, Viber, Signal.
Stay connected in major cities across {{countryName}}. Coverage varies by location.
Affordable regional data plans, starting from US$5.99.
Reliable connection across all countries in {{countryName}} region.
One plan for multiple countries — no need for separate eSIMs.
Experience seamless connectivity across {{countryName}} region with a single eSIM.
Works across all supported countries in {{countryName}} region.
Automatic when you arrive in any supported country.
Instant QR delivery via email or app.
Data-only eSIM with VoIP calling support.
Use one eSIM across all countries in {{countryName}} region.
website.NewSimfinDes.SingleCountryPlan.HowToGetE: How to get an eSIM for {countryName}
Choose a Simfinity data plan for your trip
Select how much data you need, buy the plan, and wait for the confirmation email with a QR code.
Download Simfinity and set up your eSIM
Download the Simfinity app, scan the QR code from our email, and follow the instructions on the screen.
Get ready for takeoff — your data plan will activate automatically when you arrive at your destination!
website.NewSimfinDes.SingleCountryPlan.ValuesSec: Our values aren't just inspirational words we put on a wall to look at — we live by them in everything we build.
We're replacing plastic SIM cards with an easy and eco-friendly solution that works in 200+ destinations.
No tech jargon. No clutter. We built an eSIM app that's clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate.
We care about people, not just rigid processes. Every team member and user is treated with empathy and respect.
We don't chase perfection — we chase progress. We believe that small wins make big shifts.
We stay curious, flexible, and open to the unknown, just like the explorers we built Simfinity for.
We're here to make a difference, so we focus on what truly matters — our users, team, and the world around us.

whatIsEsimNew.para: That’s old-school! Meet the eSIM — a smart digital SIM already built into your phone that lets you activate mobile data instantly without buying or changing any physical SIM cards. No shops, no plastic, no swapping — just scan, connect, and enjoy fast, reliable internet in seconds. With Simfinity, staying online while traveling becomes effortless, flexible, and 100% hassle-free.

WhatIsEsim.heroTittle: What is an eSIM — and why travelers love it
WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.content.herodes: An eSIM is a digital SIM built directly into your phone. No physical card. No swapping. No store visits. Just scan, activate, and you’re online instantly. With an eSIM, you can stay connected the moment you land — without paying expensive roaming fees or searching for a local SIM shop. Simfinity eSIMs make travel simple: fast activation, affordable data, and global coverage in minutes.

With an eSIM, you can stay connected the moment you land — without paying expensive roaming fees or searching for a local SIM shop. Simfinity eSIMs make travel simple: fast activation, affordable data, and global coverage in minutes.
WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.content.heroTittle: What is an eSIM — and why travelers love it
WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.content.heading: What is an eSIM — and why travelers love it?
WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.content.des: An eSIM is a digital SIM built directly into your phone. No physical card. No
WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.content.paragraph2: eSIMs are available on smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, and even some cars! They're great for quickly switching between phone numbers and grabbing mobile data for travel.
WhatIsEsim.WhatIsEsim.content.paragraph1: An eSIM is an embedded subscriber identity module — essentially, a built-in chip in your phone. It does everything a traditional SIM would do, but without having to slot a tiny card into your phone. Additionally, an eSIM allows you to use several carriers and phone numbers at once, which is super convenient.

esimIntro.title: Still buying physical SIM cards?
esimIntro.description: That’s old-school! Meet the eSIM — a smart digital SIM already built into your phone that lets you activate mobile data instantly without buying or changing any physical SIM cards. No shops, no plastic, no swapping — just scan, connect, and enjoy fast, reliable internet in seconds. With Simfinity, staying online while traveling becomes effortless, flexible, and 100% hassle-free.

DownloadEsimPage.features4: Works on all smartphones that support eSIM
DownloadEsimPage.heroTitle: eSIM: What is it, and how does it work?
DownloadEsimPage.heroDescription: An eSIM is a digital SIM that's built into most modern phones. It works like a physical SIM card, but without having to insert anything into your device. eSIMs offer tons of benefits, such as helping you avoid roaming fees and making it easy to switch between providers.
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneTitle: Set up an eSIM on your iPhone with the Simfinity app
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneStep1Title: Pick an eSIM data plan for your trip
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneStep1Desc: Select the country you're heading to and choose a plan.
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneStep2Desc: Get the app, tap Install eSIM, and follow the steps on the screen.
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneStep3Desc: Get ready for your trip — your plan will activate when you arrive.
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneManualHeading: Set up an eSIM manually on your iPhone
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneManualStep1: Go to Settings, then Mobile Service or Cellular.
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneManualStep2: Tap Add eSIM or Add Cellular Plan.
DownloadEsimPage.setupIphoneManualStep4: Scan the QR code or enter the details manually.
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidTitle: Set up an eSIM on your Android with the Simfinity app
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidStep1Title: Pick an eSIM data plan for your trip
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidStep1Desc: Select the country you're heading to and choose a plan.
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidStep2Desc: Get the app, tap Install eSIM and follow the steps on the screen.
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidStep3Desc: Get ready for your trip — your plan will activate when you arrive.
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidManualHeading: Set up an eSIM manually on your Android
DownloadEsimPage.setupAndroidManualStep4: Tap Scan the QR code or choose another way to add your eSIM.
DownloadEsimPage.activationTitle: How to activate your Simfinity eSIM plan
DownloadEsimPage.activationDescription: An eSIM is a digital SIM that's built into most modern phones. It works like a physical SIM card, but without having to insert anything into your device. eSIMs offer tons of benefits, such as helping you avoid roaming fees and making it easy to switch between providers.
DownloadEsimPage.benefitsHeading: What are the benefits of using an eSIM app?
DownloadEsimPage.benefitsSubheading: Using eSIMs over physical SIM cards provides all kinds of benefits:
DownloadEsimPage.benefit1Desc: Just download the app, log in, and buy a data plan. Easy!
DownloadEsimPage.benefit2Desc: It's the easiest way to avoid sneaky roaming fees.
DownloadEsimPage.benefit3Desc: Add new destinations to your existing Simfinity eSIM through the app — no new eSIMs needed.
DownloadEsimPage.ctaDescription: If you have any questions, our team is available via chat 24/7 on the Simfinity app. You can also send us an email if you have a more detailed question.
DownloadEsimPage.faq1Question: Is my phone compatible with eSIMs?
DownloadEsimPage.faq1Answer: If you got a new smartphone in the last few years, it should be compatible with eSIMs. Most smartphones released after 2020 are. However, even a new device might not support eSIMs if it was bought in a certain location, such as mainland China. To know for sure, check the list of eSIM-compatible devices.
DownloadEsimPage.faq2Question: How to manually install an eSIM on your phone?
DownloadEsimPage.faq2Answer: You can manually install and set up eSIMs on your phone by scanning the QR code from your carrier or going to Network settings and looking for an option to add a new eSIM.
DownloadEsimPage.faq3Question: Can I use an eSIM without the app?
DownloadEsimPage.faq3Answer: You can buy a Simfinity eSIM plan without the app, but you'll need to download the Simfinity app to install the eSIM.
DownloadEsimPage.faq4Question: How long does it take to activate an eSIM?
DownloadEsimPage.faq4Answer: Activating an eSIM means adding the eSIM profile to your phone by scanning the QR code or entering the information manually. Travel eSIMs are activated almost instantly.
DownloadEsimPage.faq5Question: What is the best eSIM for international travel?
DownloadEsimPage.faq5Answer: The Simfinity eSIM is one of the best options for international travel. You can add destinations without configuring new eSIMs.
DownloadEsimPage.faq6Answer: Downloading our app is free, but plans are paid. You can earn free credits through referrals.
DownloadEsimPage.faq7Question: How to get an eSIM online?
DownloadEsimPage.faq7Answer: Download the Simfinity app and easily purchase and manage your eSIM plans online.
DownloadEsimPage.faq8Question: Can I set up an eSIM myself?
DownloadEsimPage.faq8Answer: Yes, you can set up an eSIM yourself. Instructions may vary by provider. Contact your provider if needed.
DownloadEsimPage.referCtaHeading: Refer a friend and earn Simfinity credit!
DownloadEsimPage.referCtaDescription: Each referral earns you US$5 in Simfinity credits while your pals get a US$5 discount on their first plan!
